sect1.title: Available Documentation
sect1.para: The following manuals are available for this product:

listitem.para: Gives an introduction to the &productnamereg; architecture, lists the requirements, and describes how to set up, deploy, and maintain the individual components. Also contains information about troubleshooting, support, and a glossary listing the most important terms and concepts for &productname;.
Guides you through management of projects and users, images, flavors, quotas, and networks. Also describes how to migrate instances.
To complete these tasks, either use the graphical Web interface (based on &ostack; ‐, code name Horizon) or the &ostack; command line clients.
Describes how to manage images, instances, networks, volumes, and track usage.
To complete these tasks, either use the graphical Web interface (based on &ostack; ‐, code name Horizon) or the &ostack; command line clients.
A supplement to the &productname; &cloudadmin; and &productname; &clouduser;. It contains additional information for admin users and end users guides that is specific to &productname;.

sect1.para: HTML versions of the product manuals can be found in the installed system under /usr/share/doc/manual. Additionally, you can access the product-specific manuals and the upstream documentation from the Help links in the graphical Web interfaces. Find the latest documentation updates at where you can download the manuals for your product in multiple formats.
